short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives Trump an insulting nickname within articles from certain news sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gives Trump an insulting nickname within articles from certain news sites.

This extension will first "read" the text of the page you are viewing on certain news web sites.  Where it finds references to Donald Trump, it will then insert one of the following words (randomly chosen) in the middle of his name: "Loser", "Sore Loser", "Man-Child", "Cheater", "Bone Spur", "Molester", "Pussy Grabber", "Thin Skinned", "Snowflake", "Petulant", "Narcissist", "Sociopath", "Psychopath", "Racist", "Dictator", "Traitor", "Compulsive Liar", "Fraudster", "Small-Dick Energy."

So, for example, Donald Trump becomes Donald 'Loser' Trump.

This is highly entertaining and makes me smile inside every time I see it in action.  

It's nice to see a man who gives insulting nicknames to so many other people get one himself.

It's even funnier when someone uses his computer without knowing the extension is enabled!
